entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F813,1,403012}The Ashura-kai posted some quest with{F801}the Association in Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}I came all this way through the subway{F801}tunnels from Ikebukuro, hoping to snag{F801}it for myself...{F801}{F802}But now I have to walk through that{F801}poisonous swamp too?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter woman\0{F813,1,403112}Bleh... If I could use the Terminals,{F801}I wouldn't have to deal with this{F801}poisonous swamp.{F801}{F802}But I'm almost at Shinjuku... I can see{F801}the skyscrapers in the south.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F813,1,403002}Over at the Sendagaya Tunnel up ahead,{F801}there's this weird mound of rock.{F801}{F802}Is that the place where... "Koga Saburo",{F801}his name was?{F801}{F802}He was that really strong demon Tayama{F801}put there, right?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Guide\0Head north a bit and you'll find{F801}a ferryman. Ask him to take you to{F801}Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}Anything else you wanna ask?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Guide\0Head north a bit and you'll find{F801}a ferryman. Ask him to take you to{F801}Shinjuku.{F801}{F802}Anything else you wanna ask?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Guide\0Head south along the road and the{F801}entrance you find to the east side{F801}will get you into Tokyo Station.{F801}{F802}Anything else you wanna ask?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Guide\0Head south along the road and the{F801}entrance you find to the east side{F801}will get you into Tokyo Station.{F801}{F802}Anything else you wanna ask?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Guide\0Head south along the road and keep{F801}going past Tokyo Station...{F801}{F802}Then take the path west from there{F801}to get to Kasumigaseki.{F801}{F802}Anything else you wanna ask?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Guide\0Head south along the road and keep{F801}going past Tokyo Station...{F801}{F802}Then take the path west from there{F801}to get to Kasumigaseki.{F801}{F802}Anything else you wanna ask?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Guide\0Alright. Come talk to me if you ever need{F801}help, okay? I'm always glad to help out{F801}my fellow Hunters.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Guide\0Alright. Come talk to me if you ever need{F801}help, okay? I'm always glad to help out{F801}my fellow Hunters.{F801}
